about.description:
After 23 years in tech, I made a shift — driven by my passion for movement, promoting a healthy lifestyle, and empowering people to restore strength and confidence

Over the last three years, I’ve specialized in performance and rehabilitation coaching. Guiding athletes from injury recovery to endurance events like Ironman, multi-day MTB races, and beyond

Now, I’m combining science-based training with personal experience to help others move better, get stronger, and achieve ambitious goals

If you're returning from injury, training for something big, or simply looking to feel better in your body — let’s connect
